```{mermaid}
%% this makes grey text go away
%%{init: {'themeVariables': { 'edgeLabelBackground': 'transparent'}}}%%

%% Legend
flowchart LR
    Y:::className ---|Snow Cover| Z
    Z:::className1 ---|Fire Characteristics| W
    W:::className2 ---|Fuel Complexes| X
    X:::className3 ---|Climate|null  
linkStyle 0,1,2,3 stroke:#0000,stroke-width:0px;

classDef hide fill:#0000,stroke:#0000,stroke-width:0px,color:#0000;
  class legend,null hide;
  classDef hide-font color:#0000;
  class Y,Z,W,X hide-font;

classDef Snow Cover
classDef Fire Characteristic
%% define class names for colours
classDef className fill:#c6e2ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
classDef className1 fill:#ff6666,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
classDef className2 fill:#bada55,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
classDef className3 fill:#ffdab9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

```
